name: PONG SPLORIA UNLEASHED
description:
PONG SPLORIA UNLEASHED.  Cutting edge 1 button game play experience as you guide PONG through the maze.

Click and drag the left mouse button "Angry Birds Style"  to fling Pong across the maze.  Try to escape the gravity wells as you progress.

Music by FlintCustom

Art "Breakout Game Sprites" www.opengameart.org

Programming by MAG WEB DESIGNS.net

SEO by Flint SEO co

Directions:

click and drag the the left mouse button to fling Pong
